Constructor Detail

Location

public Location(float lat,
                float lon,
                float h,
                java.lang.String name)
Main Constructor, doesn'n need any extra libraries

Parameters:
lat - The latitude of your location
lon - The longitude of your location
h - The altitude of your location
name - The name of your location

Location

public Location(PApplet app,
                java.lang.String name)
Constructor, requires the importing of the json4Processing (https://github.com/agoransson/JSON-processing/downloads)Library to parse the geocoding response

Parameters:
PApplet - The parent PApplet
name - The name of our location

Location

public Location()
Constructor, doesn'n need any extra libraries Picks a default location

Method Detail

getAddress

public void getAddress(PApplet app,
                       java.lang.String query)
Try to geocode the given name, or default to a location in defaultLocations.txt - Will ask for JSON for Processing lib

Parameters:
PApplet - The parent PApplet
query - The name of the desired location. Might fail or return a false Location. Better to read the geocoding.cloudmade.com API Reference.

processElevation

public void processElevation(PApplet app)
Get elevation of the geocoded location - Will ask for JSON for Processing lib

Parameters:
PApplet - The parent PApplet

getName

public java.lang.String getName()
Get name of the location

getHeightAMSL
